app.name: TextNugs
app.description: Store and insert commonly used scripts.

scripts.text: Can you create a weekly meal plan for a family of four, keeping the budget under $100 and focusing on healthy, balanced meals?
scripts.title: Weekly Meal Plan for Family

scripts.text: Please summarize this long text into a concise, one-paragraph summary: {{clipboard}}
scripts.title: Summarize Long Text

scripts.text: I need help creating a budget for household expenses. Can you list the typical categories and suggest average percentages for each category?
scripts.title: Create Household Budget

scripts.text: Generate a random but interesting prompt for a JavaScript coding project for beginners.
scripts.title: JS Coding Project Idea

scripts.text: Write an email template for requesting vacation days at work, emphasizing the importance of early notice and covering any responsibilities during the absence.
scripts.title: Request Vacation Email Template

scripts.text: Help me create a list of goals for personal development that I can work on over the next six months.
scripts.title: Personal Development Goals

scripts.text: Suggest a list of easy, healthy snacks I can prepare quickly at home, preferably with ingredients that last a while in the pantry.
scripts.title: Healthy Snack Ideas

scripts.text: Create a simple project management plan for tracking office tasks, setting deadlines, and assigning priorities to team members.
scripts.title: Project Management Plan

scripts.text: Can you draft a polite but firm email response declining a meeting invitation that conflicts with my schedule, suggesting alternative times?
scripts.title: Decline Meeting Invite Email

scripts.text: Provide a list of best practices for organizing code comments and documentation for a team development project.
scripts.title: Best Practices for Code Documentation
